title: Most warest mobile waste of money
volume issue
body: The media could not be loaded.i have place replacement for the same phone and amazon committed for technician visit but there was no visit by tecnician and the issue is still same need solution for the same.when we try to reduce the volune only in 2 click the full volume of the phone went . there is no facility of reducing volume it full or 0

title: Good economical option
body: Bought for my father and it is perfect choice

title: 11 prime bhakwass model hai
body: Such me prime series company walo ko band karna hai.qun ki hang tho Bahuth karta hai phone. my ne Redmi ka Naa Lena ab se kohi phone isss prime ke vahja se na look na acha performance na battery na camera ek dum bhakwas hai Agra try karna hai tho leke deko 11 prime 4g
